name: Work from Home (sun-wise-man)
description:
Control

Use your mouse to move your character.

Gameplay

Survive in this new lifestyle!

Survive as long as you can by managing 2 resources, health and happiness, and doing activities can increases your resource.

Random event that may or may not help you to survive!

When doing activities, there is a chance of triggering an event that increases or decreases your resources.
